form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: TEMPLE UNIVERSITY SCHOOL OF BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION PHILADELPHIA, PENNSYLVANIA 19122 OFFICE OF THE DEAN, slw/ci

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/13/2023 TEACHER E NIVIRUM TEMPLE UNIVERSITY SCHOOL OF BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION PHILADELPHIA, PENNSYLVANIA 19122 OFFICE OF THE DEAN June 2, 1971 TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN: This is to certify that Vishvanath V. Phatak (also known as Arvind Phatak) has been employed as a member of the full-time faculty of the School of Business Administration of Temple University from September, 1966 to the present time. His current status is Associate Professor of Management and International Business, at an annual salary of $14,200.00. Should you require any additional information, please do not hesitate to contact us. Sincerely yours, Seyman L.Waythin Seymour L. Wolfbein Dean slw/ci
